title: CLDF dataset derived from Starostin's "Hmong Mien family in the Global Lexicostatistical Database" from 1991
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Starostin, Sergej. 1991. Altajskaja problema i proischoždenije japonskogo jazyka [The Altaic problem and the origin of the Japanese language]. Moscow: Nauka.
